case.title: Well-educated Domme seek 28-36 year old male sub
case.text:
I: 5'7 27 year old MBA degreed Domme. Caring, intelligent and sweet outside play. Patient, creative and communicative for play.
Seeks...
You: college educated male sub from 28 to 36 in age and 5 ft 9 over for long term D/s relationship.
Prior experience not necessary. Must be eager to learn, please and serve. A picture wouldn't hurt but it can wait after a few chats when there is trust. As such, send me a short description of yourself: name, age, height, weight, and just one thing you think I should know about you.
Mistress K
